title: Miniature, "creamer", ca. 1950–74
description: A) Compote: fotted bowl with wavy edge. B) Teapot with bulbous body, dome dover with finial. C) Rounded cup with handle. D) Slop bowl, roundedwith slightly flaring neck. E)F) Two plates. G) Cream pitcher or milk jug with turned-down spout, short handle, possibly broken off.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miniature, "creamer", ca. 1950–74.
ca. 1950–74. Glass (blue). Gift of Hamill and Barker. 1962-144-1-a/h.
